narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. Applicant wishes to be licensed as a Class A dealer.
The applicant will send the license fee and a copy of the inspection report to the Regional Office within 20 days of
the inspection.
The license fee must be mailed to the following address:
USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
2150 Center Ave. Bldg B, Mail Stop 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
UNTIL THE USDA LICENSE HAS BEEN ISSUED, NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED.
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
**Microchip request included
